title: karuNai kATTi en
sahitya:
karuNai kATTi en kavalai OTTiDu kArtikEya mUrtiyAna kIrtimAnE


anupallavi

  dharaNi tanil nAn tattaLitt-Engum taruNattil ennait-tAngavE pongum


caraNam    edir pArAmalenda vidamAgavO vandu idayam enadai nondu sidaiyavE sheidu
vadaikkum innalai vidhiyin satiyena gati kalangAdunnai tudi sheidu uyyum
